column3: News;Phnom Penh: A------ prisoner charged with theft hanged himself while in custody at the Inspectorate of Police in Khan Chbar Ampov.------The incident occurred at 3:20 pm on November 28
column7: was from the local area. Police said he had hanged himself from a cell window. A photo shows he tested positive for drug use after his arrest.------After the incident
column8: the authorities did not allow journalists to take pictures of the deceased
column9: only allowing them in front of the front of the Inspectorate of Chbar Ampov.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/390953------ ------
